character_1_text.eng: I'm HUNGRY! Can I have some ice cream?

character_2_text.eng: Lunch will be ready in five minutes. Can you hang on until then?

rows.character_1_text: I'm HUNGRY! Can I have some ice cream?
rows.character_2_text: Lunch will be ready in five minutes. Can you hang on until then?

character_2_text.eng: Okay, come wash your hands and sit down - your veggies are ready, so you can eat those while I prepare the rest of the meal.

rows.character_2_text: Okay, come wash your hands and sit down - your veggies are ready, so you can eat those while I prepare the rest of the meal.

rows.character_1_text: Well done, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, for eating all of your carrots. Come and help me get the jelly from the fridge.

character_1_text.eng: Well done, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name, for eating all of your carrots. Come and help me get the jelly from the fridge.

rows.character_1_text: Good job for eating your veggies, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! Your body will thank you!

character_1_text.eng: Good job for eating your veggies, @data.characters.f1_daughter_6.name! Your body will thank you!

rows.text_1_facilitator:
Teaching your child healthy eating habits from a young age will help them make healthy choices as they grow older. ğŸ’™ğŸ˜ƒğŸš

4ï¸âƒ£ Here are four tips you can use to support your child with healthy eating:

text_1_facilitator.eng:
Teaching your child healthy eating habits from a young age will help them make healthy choices as they grow older. ğŸ’™ğŸ˜ƒğŸš

4ï¸âƒ£ Here are four tips you can use to support your child with healthy eating:

section_1_text.eng:
Allow your child to enjoy a variety of food in moderation. Every day, make sure they have:
ğŸš 2-3 servings of carbohydrates
1 serving: 2 spoons of rice or 2 slices of bread
ğŸ… 3-4 servings of fruits and vegetables 
1 serving: Â½ cup of vegetables or 1 medium-sized fruit
ğŸ’š 1-2 servings of dairy products and protein
1 serving: 1 chicken thigh, 2 eggs or 1 glass of milk
ğŸš© Just a little bit of oil, fat, processed sugar, and salt

section_2_text.eng:
ğŸŒ· Sometimes, your child may start whining for unhealthy food choices. Take a deep breath and stay calm. 
â¡ï¸ Try redirecting your childâ€™s attention to healthier food options. Ignore their demanding behaviour if they continue. 
ğŸ… Praise or reward your child for choosing healthy foods.

section_3_text.eng:
ğŸ‘‚ Listen to your child when they say they are hungry or full. 
ğŸ’¡ Depending on your childâ€™s activities for the day, your child may require less or more food. 
ğŸ’š If your child always seems hungry or full, a doctor can help to figure out why.
â˜• your child will also observe and learn from the eating habits of people around them. Make healthy food choices as a family to teach your child to do the same.

section_4_text.eng:
ğŸ’™ Preparing food with love is important for your child - and so is keeping it clean!
âœ¨ Wash your hands before handling food or feeding your child. 
ğŸ’¡ Wash fresh food items before cooking them.
â˜€ï¸ Hot weather makes food spoil quickly. It is best to store food in airtight containers or the fridge so they stay fresh. 
â­ Keep the kitchen, fridge, cutlery, and table tops clean from dust, insects, and house lizards.

rows.quiz_1_question:
Todayâ€™s home activity is to talk with your child about the importance of eating healthy foods and water instead of fizzy drinks. Plan to make better choices together, and praise them each time they make a healthy choice. 

Do you have time to chat with your child about this today? â°
